decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">All existing historic features including, but not limited to, chimney pieces, plasterwork, architraves, panelling, doors, staircase balustrading shall remain undisturbed in their existing position and shall be fully protected during the course of works on site, unless specifically authorised otherwise on the drawings hereby approved.&nbsp; The development and works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that those features which contribute to the special architectural and historic interest of the building are retained</span></p>

<div><font face="Arial"><span style="font-size: 16px; white-space: pre-wrap;">None of the following shall be undertaken during the construction hereby approved:</span></font></div><div><font face="Arial"><span style="font-size: 16px; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></font></div><div><ol style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; margin-bottom: 0px;"><li dir="ltr" style="margin-left: 15px; list-style-type: lower-alpha; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><p dir="ltr" role="presentation" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">No additional punctuations in the external walls and roofs shall be permitted other than as shown on the drawings hereby approved;</span></p></li><li dir="ltr" style="margin-left: 15px; list-style-type: lower-alpha; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><p dir="ltr" role="presentation" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">All new and replacement external rainwater and soil pipes shall be of traditional design, formed in cast iron and painted black;</span></p></li><li dir="ltr" style="margin-left: 15px; list-style-type: lower-alpha; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><p dir="ltr" role="presentation" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">No soil stacks, soil vent pipes, plumbing, pipes, flues, vents or ductwork shall be fixed on the external faces of the building other than those shown on the drawings hereby approved;</span></p></li><li dir="ltr" style="margin-left: 15px; list-style-type: lower-alpha; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><p dir="ltr" role="presentation" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">No new grilles, satellite dishes, aerials, meter boxes, security alarms, lighting, security or other cameras or other fixtures or plant shall be mounted on the external faces or roof of the building other than those shown on the drawings hereby approved.</span></p></li></ol><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building</span></p></div>

<p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Notwithstanding the approved drawings and documents, detailed drawings and full particulars of the following shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to the commencement of the relevant part of the works.&nbsp; The works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved:</span></p><ol style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; margin-bottom: 0px;"><li dir="ltr" style="margin-left: 15px; list-style-type: lower-alpha; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><p dir="ltr" role="presentation" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Details of the proposed lower ground floor excavation and build up in the form of a typical section showing the depth of excavation, the dimensions and materials of the build up and the location of the underfloor heating;</span></p></li><li dir="ltr" style="margin-left: 15px; list-style-type: lower-alpha; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><p dir="ltr" role="presentation" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Details of any underpinning to the garden wall.</span></p><p dir="ltr" role="presentation" style="line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></p></li></ol><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">All new works, and works of making good to the retained fabric, whether internal or external, shall be finished to match the original work with regard to the methods used and to material, dimensions, composition, form, colour, finish and profile, and in the case of brickwork, facebond and pointing.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON:</span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">All new, rebuilt and reinstated brickwork shall be bedded, pointed and rendered using a lime based mortar consisting of 1 part lime to 3 parts sand.&nbsp; Cementitious mortars shall not be used.&nbsp; Pointing shall be in a slightly (2/3mm) recessed style and not flush, bucket handle, ribbon, weatherstruck or raised pointing.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that special regard is paid to protecting the special architectural and historic interest and integrity of the building</span></p>

The Development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 18(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended.

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
description: Demolition of existing lower ground floor extension and erection of new lower ground floor extension, replacement of door to upper ground floor level with a window. New landscape design to the rear garden. Part of the garden wall in disrepair between nos 29 and 30 to be re-built. Partial demolition to the rear closet wing, general renovation at lower ground floor together with the floor level of upper ground floor closet wing to be raised by 160mm in the hallway
